description: Similar to the Galloping Goose and Lochside trails, this is a wide gravel path that follows the old British Columbia Electric Railway line. The railway originally ran from Ogden Point to Deep Cove. From the intersection of Interurban and Goward Rd, follow the trail north to the Red Barn Market.
directions: From Victoria follow the Pat Bay Highway and take the West Saanich Road exit. From West Saanich Road turn left on Interurban Road, then left onto Elk Road to find parking. Return down Elk Road and cross Interurban to get to the trail head.
title: Interurban Rail Trail
